title: 1834 Newsprint Type - Sydney, Australia
content:
Hi All

Would appreciate if anyone can identify the font attached.

Cheers

Brooke

Font: 

 Thorowgood D Regular 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sydney Herald Font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/typophile.com/files/Sydney%20Herald%20Font.png) | 44.63 KB |
author: brookeobrien

comments.content:
Compare to Thorowgood, a fat face first cut in the 1830s. Digital by several foundries including  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/thorowgood/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/thorowgood/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/thorowgood/")  
UPDATE  
The digital version:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ThorowgoodAsSUP_6446.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ThorowgoodItalicAsSyd_6076.gif)
  
Don

Adding some alternatives: [Battista](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/preusstype/battista), [Type No.8 and No.9](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.waldenfont.com/product.asp?productid=4) WF, [Gravitas One](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/gravitas-one), [Falstaff](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/falstaff), [Normande](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/normande-bq)
